button.supertip: Information about the Documizer Author Tool.

button.label: Landscape
button.supertip: Insert a page in Landscape orientation.

button.label: Portrait
button.supertip: Insert a page in Portrait orientation.

button.label: Rotate
button.supertip: Rotate section to either Landscape or Portrait.

toggleButton.label: Page Break Before
toggleButton.supertip: Force text to move to the top of next page.

toggleButton.label: Keep With Next
toggleButton.supertip: Keep the selected paragraph with the following paragraph.

button.label: Hyperlink Blue
button.supertip: Apply Hyperlink Blue to the selected text.

button.label: No Break Space
button.supertip: Insert a non-breaking space to prevent text from being divided onto two lines.

button.label: No Break Hyphen
button.supertip: Insert a non-breaking hyphen to prevent text from being divided onto two lines.

menu.label: Cleaner
menu.supertip: Clear coloring from selected text or delete hidden text and guidance text.

button.label: Delete Guidance
button.supertip: Delete hidden text and guidance text in italic green.
